outline:
1. to wrong, do violence to, treat violently, do wrongly
    1. (Qal) to treat violently, do wrong
      1. of physical wrong
      2. of ethical wrong
      3. of physical and ethical wrong
    2. (Niphal) to be treated violently
kjv_def: make bare, shake off, violate, do violence, take away violently, wrong, imagine wrongfully.
strongs_def: to be violent; by implication, to maltreat
